description:
• Essential Data Analytics with Excel online Tutorial course provides basic as well as advance skills & knowledge required to become a Data Analyst. This course provides you a better vision of Excel in order to train you excellently. Participants, at the end of the training, will be technically competent in essential concepts of Analysis such as Descriptive Statistics, Forecasting and Visualizing Data, Hypothesis Testing, Probability Distribution, Covariance, Correlations and Bayesian Analysis.
  • This course provides an overview of the fundamentals, from common calculations means from very basic to implementation of Bayesian analysis that is also the part of Data Analysis in Excel.
  • This course contains lectures as videos, additional Exercise files are attached with third video "How to use Exercise Files" for your self practice and complementary book on Excel has attached with last Lecture of the course in order to provide you more help.
  • Excel in this course is convenient for all those individuals who don't want to learn hard core programming in order to get insights from the data for day to day basis. So it is useful for those who want to begin Data Analysis quickly and want to become Data Analyst.
title: Learn Business Data Analysis with Excel in under 5Hrs.
